General.Name: Gome Telecom Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Gome Telecom Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of mobile terminal products. The company was formerly known as Sanlian Commercial Co., Ltd. Gome Telecom Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded 1989 and is based in Jinan, China.
General.Address: No. 12, Baotuquan North Road, Jinan, China, 250011

1.Name: Ms. Jie  Shao
1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
